mainText:
I've never met Mr. Jobs directly, but I've read so much about him and
seen his videos, following news about him and Apple.
Though he's somewhere out there faraway, he touched my life. Through
his innovations, his thoughts, he has changed the world I live in.
It's very saddening hearing Mr. Jobs has passed away, but his legacy
will live on and the world will always remember him.
Farewell Mr. Steve Jobs, may your soul rest in peace.
author: NataLia
